attributes.action: make the creative works of The Beatles become part of the school curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To provide young children with the best possible start to their understanding of popular music,there could be no better example than the Iconic symbols of British popular music-The Beatles,whose legacy is still being felt today on many levels.Making their body of work part of the school music curriculum could only enrich and enthuse young minds to make music with passion and creativity.A simple understanding of the song writing process,British culture and history could inspire a whole new generation to produce inovative music for the future.  So"With a little help from my friends"we can all make this happen and help make learning a more enjoyable experience.And remember "All you need is love"
